about.text: Hi, I'm Juled Zaganjori, a Full Stack Developer based in Germany. I enjoy creating things that live on the internet, whether that be websites, applications, or anything in between. My goal is to always build products that provide pixel-perfect, performant experiences.

projects.title: Pulse AI (2023)
projects.description: Pulse is your personal health assistant. Keep track of your health with Pulse AI. Blazing-fast diagnose system and chatting capabilities.

projects.title: Text2Video (2023)
projects.description: Automated video creation from a single prompt, through the use of GPT-3.5, Google Cloud TTS, Pexels API and MoviePy.

projects.title: shkence.bot (2022)
projects.description: Fully autonomous social media postings bot for Instagram. Get your WordPress posts on Instagram in no time.

projects.title: Sindi AI (2021)
projects.description: AI chatbot that can chat with you, tell you the weather, jokes, play music and more. Awarded 1st place in ASEF programming category.

projects.title: Colorizer (2021)
projects.description: Old image and video colorization and restoration using DeOldify model.

projects.title: iPlant (2019-2022)
projects.description: A project about helping the environment by planting trees. Earn points, personalize your trees and more. Awarded 1st place in NASA SpaceApps in Albania, 1st place and 1000 â‚¬ grant in Upshift startup competition.

projects.title: Group2A (2021)
projects.description: Chemistry project about the periodic table. You can learn about the elements of group 2A and their properties.

projects.title: Gazeta HRP (2021)
projects.description: High school newspaper website. You can read our project group articles in an interactive way.

projects.title: Symptoms.al (2020)
projects.description: Online symptom checker for COVID-19. You can check your symptoms and get a result based on your answers.

projects.title: Wintersports Albania (2018)
projects.description: Small project for ASEF web design competition. You can learn about the most popular winter sports in Albania.
